about_the_game:
Pass the levels on platforms, springs, fans, overcome spikes and angry enemies, as well as moments when everything turns upside down. Controlling the physics and the right moment to walk or jump helps you overcome each challenge proposed by the game's villain.

BE THE BEST IN THE CHALLENGES OF EACH PHASE


You were invited to training with varied challenges, fruit of the unrealistic mind of John Meat and Doctor Lewis RockBone. Upon arriving on the island of animals, John imprisoned and put everyone in training, which includes you. And the only way to defeat him is to overcome all of his crazy challenges.

USE THE DANGERS OF THE PHASES TO YOUR FAVOR


As you are in a controlled training environment, use the challenges to your advantage, from thorns, springs and angry enemies, understand the patterns to improve your skills, as the new challenges gradually become more difficult.

DEVELOP YOUR PLAYING STYLE


With a pleasant difficulty curve for all players, you will soon notice that there will be moments where precision and timing will help you pass the level, other moments, speed and springs will help you with your progress, and moments when everything will be upside down. . So be smart and create strategies for each moment.

PROTECT THE ANIMALS ISLAND


John Meat and Doctor Lewis RockBone intend to turn the island of animals into farms and pastures for their cows, pigs and chickens. Even though you are stuck in training, the animals are plotting ways to expel you, and you are essential to overcome the challenges and free the island from the ambitions of these two outsiders.

name: Block Room

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7 SP1, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 10
  • Processor: Multi-core 2Ghz CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 (DirectX® 10) compliant graphics card and driver
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Overcome the challenges of each mini stage, in this precision, speedrun and hit kill platform game, each action at the right time makes you advance. Perform your best stunts and moves to free the island from the animals of John Meat and Doctor Lewis RockBone ambitions!
